## okta-admin apps revoketoken

Revokes the specified token for the specified application (or all tokens if none are specified).

### Synopsis

Revokes the specified token for the specified application (or all tokens if none are specified).

```
okta-admin apps revoketoken <appId> [<tokenId>] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for revoketoken
```
